name: OWRC: Open World Racing
description:
True racing simulator waiting for you, experience ultra realistic car physics and drifting mechanic, feel like real street racer driver! Rush through 100 sq. km open world avoiding traffic or take part in challenging racing events against famous street racers from all over the world. Drive most expensive and fast cars. Did you ever wonder how is it to be a street racer and drive super rare and expensive cars? OWRC is realistic open world racing simulator created to give you this opportunity. Start from simple car and finish sending to drift fastest car in the world worth millions of dollars...

Time to start your engine, street racer! Welcome to Hawaii island, racing heaven where most powerful cars and most experienced racers fighting in countless racing events for title of top driver. Huge open world living its daily life until your car touch the road. Realistic racing simulator will make you feel adrenaline, smell burning tires of drifting vehicle and listen for high pitch engine sound working on its highest RPM. This is you on the road seeking champion title among world most famous drivers! Any road of this open world is yours to explore, master street racer skill and climb the top ranking!

Game features:
• Amazing PC level graphics
• 100 sq. km huge open world
• Traffic vehicles
• Realistic racing simulator
• Easy to master and fun to drive
• Exciting drifting mechanic
• Lot of racing events
• Wide range of cars
• Gamepad support
and much more...

Show everyone your super driving skills and amazing cars! Send car to drift and make shots of most crazy moments with game camera mode, use hashtag #OWRC and let your friends see how cool you are!
